metadata.description: Intraday sell signal configuration for Indian equities
metadata.author: Algorithm Discovery System

v1.0.name: Gap Down Momentum
v1.0.query: (15 minute close < 15 minute open) and (15 minute volume > 1.5 * prev 15 minute volume)

v1.1.name: Breakdown with Volume
v1.1.query: (15 minute close crosses below vwap) and (15 minute volume > 2 * avg(15, volume))

v1.0.name: Bearish Reversal Pattern
v1.0.query: (15 minute high > prev 15 minute high) and (15 minute close < prev 15 minute low)

v1.0.name: VWAP Rejection
v1.0.query: (high > vwap) and (close < vwap) and (volume > avg(20, volume))

v1.1.name: Previous Day High Failure
v1.1.query: (high > prev day high) and (close < prev day high)

v1.0.name: High Relative Volume Drain
v1.0.query: (volume > 2 * avg(20, volume)) and (close < open) and (close < vwap)
